title: What is this picture from?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I use the league screensaver app, and every so often it resets and I lose all my saved playlists _(really annoying btw)_. So tonight I went into the program to re-create all my screensavers again.

Went to Taliyah _(of course)_, and found this image:
http://imgur.com/a/Xr3ng

Now that is from no animation/artwork I have ever seen.
There were also ones for Gnar, Ahri, Garen, Poppy etc etc. all in the same style.

http://imgur.com/a/WhIo5

http://imgur.com/a/vOm4J

I thought maybe there was a new animation or something i haven't seen.
But I cant find anything, not on OCE or NA or the League youtube.


Does anyone know what these are from? _(sorry if this is a stupid question.)_
But if theres an animation or artwork presentation I haven't seen, id love to be pointed in its direction.
Especially if it has Taliyah in it.

Thanks :)

replies.body:
Ohhhh thank you ^^

very pretty!

I now have to extract some of them for wallpapers :P
